description:
Welcome to our detailed walkthrough of changepoint modelling in PyMC, presented by Abuzar Mahmood. This video is a part of our upcoming live event, "The Only Constant is Change: Bespoke Changepoint Modelling in PyMC," and is designed to give you a head-start in understanding and applying changepoint models to multivariate data.

🔍 In this video, you will find:
- Step-by-Step Walkthroughs: Abuzar takes you through the details of building changepoint models using PyMC.
Hands-On Learning: Follow along with the notebook to apply what you learn in real-time.
Find the NoteBook here: https://github.com/abuzarmahmood/pymcon_bayesian_changepoint/blob/72102ad6149b86d586595bf4523f40f66eb20c25/Bayesian_Changepoint_Zoo_neural_data.ipynb

🔗 Join Us Live!
Don't forget to join our live event for a deeper dive into the background/context and mixture model discussion. 
Check out the Discourse post for more details and register for the event today. 
🔗 Discourse post: https://discourse.pymc.io/t/13251
🔗 Register for the live Q&A session: https://www.meetup.com/pymc-online-meetup/events/297203071
🔗 PyMCon Website: https://pymcon.com/events/

📢 PyMCon is a community conference that shares the latest in statistical practices, tricks, and tips. Submit your proposal for the PyMCon Web Series CFP and be part of this exciting community. 🔗 Submit your proposal here: https://pymcon.com/cfp/ 

📩 Join the PyMCon mailing list to stay up-to-date on the latest news, insights, and announcements. 🔗 Join the mailing list here: https://dashboard.mailerlite.com/forms/241188/73241617305175542/share 

🤝 Connect with us on Discourse and Meetup and be part of a vibrant community of statisticians, data analysts, and enthusiasts. 
📺 PyMCon Web Series: https://pymcon.com/ 
👥 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pymc/ 
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/pymc_devs 
🤝 Meetup: https://www.meetup.com/pymc-online-meetup/ 
🐘 Mastodon: https://bayes.club/@pymc 
💬 Discourse, Q&A/Discussion: https://discourse.pymc.io 
🐙 GitHub: https://github.com/pymc-devs/pymc


#PyMConWebseries #BayesianStatistics #Python #DataAnalysis #SportsAnalytics
title: PyMCon Web Series - Bespoke Changepoint Modelling in PyMC - Model Walkthroughs by Abuzar Mahmood
